Title: Relates to creating a pilot program for the field testing of driving while intoxicated vehicle sensor devices; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Relates to creating a pilot program for the field testing of driving while intoxicated vehicle sensor devices to be administered by the Commissioner of the Department of Motor Vehicles in consultation with the Driver Alcohol Detection System for Safety Program and the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.
LawCode: Add ยง1225-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to creating a pilot program for the field testing of driving while intoxicated vehicle sensor devices; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
